name: Hidden Object: Home Makeover
description: Help Emma restore her grandparents' old house! Hidden Object, Match-3 and decoration all in one game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
